title: The Secret Trilogy: Three Novels... One Epic Love Story
description: BARGAIN BUNDLE: THE SECRET KEEPING, FORTUNE IS A WOMAN & THE STOLEN KISS (unabridged-10 pt font) Dr. Helaine Kristenson is the leading authority in the field of psychosexual relations and the bestselling author of the self-help bible 'Keeping Mr. Right'. Professionally she deals with secrets of the heart everyday. Privately she's got a few of her own to keep her busy. Strategist Lydia Beaumont is headed to the top in corporate finance. Professionally she has no secrets. Privately she's just unearthed one that's going to rock her world a bit. Supermodel Sharon Chambers is the highest paid poser on the planet. Professionally her life of debauchery is an open book. Privately even she's keeping some secrets. But that can't last... Love, sex, reporters, blackmail--what's YOUR secret worth? (THE SECRET KEEPING was a LAMBDA Notable Book, a finalist for a Goldie Award, and an IPPY Bronze medalist. The trilogy was nominated for the Ferro/Grumley prize in fiction.)
author: Francine Saint Marie
